name: Modification of IE Registry Settings
description: Detects the modification of the registry settings used for Internet Explorer and other Windows components that use these settings
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:/[Ss][Ee][Tt][Vv][Aa][Ll][Uu][Ee]/ AND registry.path:/.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Nn][Ee][Tt]\ [Ss][Ee][Tt][Tt][Ii][Nn][Gg][Ss].*/) AND (NOT ((winlog.event_data.Details:/[Dd][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd].*/) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:(/[Cc][Oo][Oo][Kk][Ii][Ee]\:/ OR /[Vv][Ii][Ss][Ii][Tt][Ee][Dd]\:/ OR /\([Ee][Mm][Pp][Tt][Yy]\)/)) OR (registry.path:(/.*\\[Cc][Aa][Cc][Hh][Ee].*/ OR /.*\\[Zz][Oo][Nn][Ee][Mm][Aa][Pp].*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Pp][Aa][Dd][Dd][Ee][Cc][Ii][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn].*/)) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:/[Bb][Ii][Nn][Aa][Rr][Yy]\ [Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]/))))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((winlog.event_data.EventType:SetValue AND registry.path:*\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Internet\ Settings*) AND (NOT ((winlog.event_data.Details:DWORD*) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:(Cookie\: OR Visited\: OR \(Empty\))) OR (registry.path:(*\\Cache* OR *\\ZoneMap* OR *\\WpadDecision*)) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:Binary\ Data))))`
